meta.description: Rafa Mori - Full Cycle Developer Portfolio

about.title: About Me
about.intro: Hello! I am a Full Cycle Developer passionate about technology and innovation. Here are a little bit about who I am and what I do:
about.details: Experienced tech leader with a strong background in software development and system architecture, specializing in high-performance, scalable solutions. Proficient in Go, Oracle Database, NoSQL, Java, JavaScript, PHP, C#, and modern frameworks. Passionate about automation, containerized environments, and seamless system integrations. Advanced in English, proactive, and always eager to push technology forward.

contact.title: Contact
contact.footer: I am always open to new opportunities and collaborations. If you are interested in working with me or have any questions, feel free to reach out!
